title: 314 is taking over my life!
content:
Garg! When I look at a clock - *way* more than if it were random - it is 3:14!!! Aaaahhhhh! I can't decide if this is very cool, or very un-cool. At least its not 3:15 all the time ...-The CK Guy

*sigh* Keen 7 *eyes glaze over*

title: Re: holy crap
content:
Hehe, that's even better! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img]

Hmmm, interesting weight there. It's also fun that the weight is 3.14 and not 3.15, with a name like that (Mortimer & McMire). [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: holy crap
content: Once i dumped out a king-size bag of M&Ms and it spelled "KEEN" [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img]  [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: 314 indeed!
content:
When you come to the last level in Keen 3, Commander Keen's IQ turns out to be 314!! Wow!
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img] . . .[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] . . .[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img] . . .[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] If the universe were toast, what jelly would you put on it?

title: Re: 314 is taking over my life!
content: woah when i read this topic, i decided 2 look at the clock, and it was 3:14!!!! this seems 2 happen 2 me a lot, the clock is always 3:14.

title: Here's another
content:
Obviously something happened to the board since I was last here, to judge by all these "missing" comments....

Anyway, I just got my eBay bill, and thought it worth commenting on:

"No payment is due on your eBay account. Your credit account balance is -AU $3.14."

title: Re: Here's another
content:
Yup, big attack... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-shikadi.gif[/img]

I've seen 314 and 315 many times this past week.
Lets see:
I had 315 coins in a game [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img]
There were 314 items in a shop in this game [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]
uhhhhh.... pi! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: Here's another
content: Hehe, nice balance adurdin. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Yeah, there was some attack to ezBoard. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] Welcome back.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: And another!
content:
I was working on my mod, when i thought "i might even be able to finish these new keen sprites ([img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] ) today!"
So i looked at the clock and it said 3:15! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img] [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: And another!
content:
Well, well, well, Mort has been active in my absence.

Last wensday my brother took his Physical chemistry exam, in room MSG 315, and, look at the pic! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img]

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/315pic.png[/img]A proud member of the signature stealing society


[img]http://cheston.com/pbf/PBF042BCPyroBilly.jpg[/img]

"No one should be here.
" -Level Lord

title: Matrix[314]
content:
I just happened to watch a bit of Matrix Reloaded and noticed this:

Keymaker: There is a power station. it must be destroyed.
Niobe: There must be some kind of failsafe.
Keymaker: Yes, there is an emergency system. The core network of the grid must be accessed. The emergency system must be deactivated.
Soren: Then what do you need us for? Neo could take 'em both out easier than we could.
Keymaker: There's no time.
Niobe: Why?
Keymaker: Once the door is unprotected, the connection will be severed. But another connection must first be made.
Ghost: How long will that take?
Keymaker: Exactly 314 seconds.
Soren: Just over 5 minutes.

Considering the other numerological references (Neo/One, Trinity, 101 [binary 5, 6th including zero], 303 [sum = 6], Matrix v6) I'd say it could be an intentional allusion to Pi, and thus the cyclic nature of Zion/the One's purpose.

Still, Keen's IQ showing up when the entire human race is once again at stake has to stand for something...Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

"This is how liberty dies--with thunderous applause." -Padme

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: Matrix[314]
content:
I've noticed that long ago.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] But no idea what it could be.. But considering Matrix's other numbers; different primes, 101, 303, I'm sure it means Pi in that movie (or that Wachowskis are Keen fans).

Other meaning I can think of could be 314 (circle) and 5 (well, five corners) making that pagan symbol. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-barf.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!
